attributes.action: If we take part in European Union Elections, also hold a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: As it is now highly likely we will be taking part in European Union Elections, and are witnessing the slow and painful collapse of this Conservative Government, it seems only right to combine 2 Elections to save the country much needed money and time.
attributes.background: So many times we have heard that the people do not want to keep returning to the polls. So lets combine a couple!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it would now be too late to hold a general election on the same date as the European Elections.

You might like to sign this petition calling for another general election instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
